Plot: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.
Title: Agent Cody Banks
Writer: Ashley Miller (screenplay), Zack Stentz (screenplay), Scott Alexander (screenplay), Larry Karaszewski (screenplay), Jeffrey Jurgensen (story)
Actors: Frankie Muniz, Hilary Duff, Angie Harmon, Keith David
tomatoConsensus: Should satisfy young teens, but offers nothing new for those who are familiar with the formula.
